snippet: The unthinkable happened 20 years ago, in the heart of Europe, in this cosmopolitan city that saw itself as beyond ethnic and sectarian divisions. It was not. This weekend the residents and some of the journalists who covered that conflict...
abstract: The unthinkable happened 20 years ago, in the heart of Europe, in this cosmopolitan city that saw itself as beyond ethnic and sectarian divisions. It was not. This weekend the residents and some of the journalists who covered that conflict remembered.

headline.main: Honoring Sarajevo's Victims and Its Survivors
